title: Epic: Multi-tenant auth & RBAC
body:
- [ ] DB migrations for tenants, users, memberships
- [ ] JWT auth with tenant_id + role
- [ ] Frontend login and tenant switcher
- [ ] Auth & Tenancy docs and tests

title: Epic: Estimator catalog & XML export
body:
- [ ] Catalog schemas and CRUD endpoints
- [ ] Estimate builder with OH&P, taxes, waste
- [ ] Carrier XML export endpoint
- [ ] UI screens and unit tests

title: Epic: Incentive rules DSL & finance engine
body:
- [ ] Rules DSL parser and evaluator
- [ ] Incentive stacking and finance metrics
- [ ] Incentive summary UI and reports
- [ ] Example rules and unit tests

title: Epic: ESG sustainability layer
body:
- [ ] Rules DB and migrations
- [ ] ESG API endpoints (assess, credits, energystar, report)
- [ ] Dashboard ESG tab and report download
- [ ] Docs and tests
